Sort Precincts

Source: R/sort.R
geo_sort.Rd

Reorders precincts by distance from the NW corner of the bounding box.

geo_sort(shp)

Arguments

shp

sf dataframe, required.

Value

sf dataframe

Examples

data(checkerboard)
geo_sort(checkerboard)

#> Simple feature collection with 64 features and 3 fields
#> Geometry type: POLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 0 ymin: 0 xmax: 8 ymax: 8
#> CRS:           NA
#> First 10 features:
#>    i j id                       geometry
#> 1  0 0  1 POLYGON ((0 0, 1 0, 1 1, 0 ...
#> 2  0 1  2 POLYGON ((0 1, 1 1, 1 2, 0 ...
#> 3  0 2  3 POLYGON ((0 2, 1 2, 1 3, 0 ...
#> 4  1 0  9 POLYGON ((1 0, 2 0, 2 1, 1 ...
#> 5  1 1 10 POLYGON ((1 1, 2 1, 2 2, 1 ...
#> 6  1 2 11 POLYGON ((1 2, 2 2, 2 3, 1 ...
#> 7  0 3  4 POLYGON ((0 3, 1 3, 1 4, 0 ...
#> 8  2 0 17 POLYGON ((2 0, 3 0, 3 1, 2 ...
#> 9  2 1 18 POLYGON ((2 1, 3 1, 3 2, 2 ...
#> 10 1 3 12 POLYGON ((1 3, 2 3, 2 4, 1 ...
